title: Chicken Korma
description: Savor the royal taste of our Chicken Korma, a creamy blend of tender chicken and aromatic spices, delivered to your door for an authentic Indian delight.

title: Paneer do pyaja
description: Delight in our Paneer Do Pyaza – succulent paneer, onions, and aromatic spices in a rich curry, delivered for an exquisite taste of Indian cuisine.

title: Tandoori roti
description: Experience the true taste of India with our Tandoori Roti – soft, flame-baked perfection delivered to your door.

title: Lachha paratha
description: Indulge in the crisp layers of our Lachha Paratha – a flaky delight that elevates any meal, delivered fresh for a taste of Indian culinary simplicity.

title: Garlic mashroom
description: Savor the delectable blend of garlic-infused mushrooms – a flavorful delight to complement any dish, delivered for a gourmet touch to your meal.

title: Mutton curry
description: Enjoy the rich taste of our Mutton Curry – succulent mutton pieces in a flavorful curry, delivered to your doorstep for an authentic Indian feast.

title: Veg noodles
description: Delight in our Veg Noodles – a wok-tossed medley of colorful vegetables and perfectly cooked noodles, delivered for a quick and tasty Asian-inspired treat.

title: Pav bhaji
description: Savor the iconic flavors of our Pav Bhaji – a mouthwatering blend of spiced vegetables served with buttery pav buns, delivered for a delightful street food experience.

title: Golgappe
description: Experience the burst of flavors with our Golgappe – crispy, hollow puris filled with spicy, tangy delights, delivered for an instant taste of Indian street food joy

title: Samosa
description: Crunch into perfection with our Samosas – golden, crispy triangles filled with spiced potatoes and peas, delivered for a savory taste of India's favorite snack.

title: Poha
description: Savor simplicity with our Poha – a light and flavorful dish of flattened rice, spices, and fresh herbs, delivered for a comforting breakfast or snack experience.

title: Chilly chiken
description: Spice up your taste buds with our Chilli Chicken – succulent chicken wok-tossed with vibrant bell peppers and fiery spices, delivered for a bold and flavorful dining experience.

title: Chiken korma
description: Indulge in our Chicken Korma – a velvety blend of tender chicken, cashew, and aromatic spices, delivered for a rich and regal taste of Indian cuisine.

title: Chicken biryani
description: Savor the aromatic perfection of our Chicken Biryani – fragrant basmati rice layered with succulent chicken, infused with aromatic spices, and delivered for a royal feast in every bite.
